title: 2 Mic Christopher shows
description:
This torrent includes the following two shows:


Mic Christopher
9/20/01
The Lobby
Cork, Ireland
AUD
Missing last three songs


Bones
On My Way To Heaven
Oxford Town
Winesong
You Ain't Going Nowhere
HeyDay
Hungry For Your Love
I've Got Your Back
Loneliest Man In Town
Picture Of Love
Races
That's What Good Friends Do



Comment
Featuring Glen Hansard
________________________________________________________

Mic Christopher
10/06/01
Live On Campus
Vienna, Austria
AUD


Kids Song
The Lonliest Man In Town
I've Got Your Back
Oxford Town
The Whole Of The Moon


Comment
w/Glen Hansard

________________________________________________________

The audio quality on these are average audio recordings. I received these in a trade years ago, they were burned TAO, which means there were two second gaps between each track. I imported them to Adobe Audition as one long track, edited out the gaps and re-cut the tracks. Some of the tracks segue into each other oddly, it almost sounds like they were recorded at different shows, or the recorded literally paused between each song. I have tried to minimize the effect of this as much as possible without losing too much of the show. These are not perfect, but I felt they needed to be shared as I have never seen a Mic Christopher show circulated anywhere. Please feel free to share these anywhere you please.
